original_title: Cat in the Hat: Tricks and Treats
overview: A new spooky adventure this DVD brings, with The Cat, Nick and Sally, Fish and the Things. Meet the eeriest critters you have ever seen, arrived just in time for this Halloween! There will be lots of tricks and, of course lots of treats, to share with the animal friends you will meet! There's a coconut crab, spider monkeys and bats, and plenty more fun with The Cat in the Hat!
tagline: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That! Tricks and Treats
title: Cat in the Hat: Tricks and Treats
